import './index.scss' import AnimatedLetters from "../AnimatedLetters" import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faAngular } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' const About = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') useEffect(() => { (async () => { return setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 3000) })(); }, []) return (

ambitious

confident

flexible

) } export default About
